title: Summer Picnics
subtle: Informational (nonfiction), 16 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile BR10L
description: Summer is a great season for outdoor activities such as picnics. In Summer Picnics, readers learn about all the things people can see while on a picnic during the summer. Strong picture-to-text connections make this an ideal book for emergent readers.
highFrequencyWords: cups, foods, fun, hats, picnics, plates, shoes, summer, sun
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
